text: [Music]
hello I'm Victor a cloud Support
Engineer here at the AWS office in Cape
Town South Africa today I will show you
how to set up Amazon s3 as the circuits
for the AWS database migration service
in a single AWS accounts let me walk you
through the process after logging into
the AWS management console navigates to
the s3 console creates your s3 buckets
specify the buckets name and choose
create
inside the pockets create a folder
specify in name and choose save
navigates to the I am console choose
policies from the left side of the
navigation pane and dangers creates
policy choose Jason and then paste in
the templates as found in our
documentation updates the policy to
refer to the buckets name you created
earlier and choose review policy enter a
name optionally you can include a
description then choose creates policy
after creates in your policy in the I am
console go to roles choose create rule
choose the EMS and select next
permissions in the search field enter
the name of the policy that you created
select it and then choose next tags
choose next review enter a rule name of
your choice and optionally add the
description dangerous create rule sick
in notes of the arm for this rule you
will need it later after creating your
rule navigates to the DMS console choose
endpoints and Dame selects creates
endpoints selects circuits endpoints
enter an endpoint identifier of your
choice then choose h3 as the circuit
engine from the drop-down lists the end
of the IEM rule that she created earlier
into the service access rule and field
enter the name of the buckets and
buckets folder that you created earlier
if you have any extra connection
attributes you can add it on the
endpoint specific settings finally you
have the option of testing the endpoints
connection you can test this later but
we'll go ahead to test this now you
should already have a replication
instance created in your desired EPC on
that cyst endpoints connection selects
your V PC and replication in flames and
then choose run tests the test takes
some time to complete here our test is
successful so we can go ahead and create
endpoints thanks for watching and happy
cloud computing from all of us here at
AWS
